destination.description: Configure the destination IPv4 Address/hostname followed by             port number for the IP SLA test.

advantage-factor.description: Configure acceptable degradation in voice quality.

codec-type.description: Configure the codec-type for the VoIP SLA test.

PORT-NUM.description: Source port for the IP SLA.

IP-ADDR.description: Source IPv4 address for the IP SLA.

source.description: Configure the source IPv4 Address/VLAN ID followed by port             number for the IP SLA test.

IP-ADDR.description: Destination IPv4 address for the IP SLA.

host-name.description: Configure the destination IPv4 Address/hostname followed by             port number for the IP SLA test.

destination.description: Configure the destination IPv4 Address/hostname followed by             port number for the IP SLA test.

source.description: Configure the source VLAN ID for the IP SLA test.

IP-ADDR.description: IP address of the name server.

name-server.description: Configure the name server for the IP SLA test.

target-hostname.description: Configure the target hostname for the IP SLA test.

COUNT.description: Number of times to run the IP SLA tests.

time.description: Date and time to stop the SLA test.

date.description: Date and time to stop the SLA test.

repetitions.description: Configure the number of times the test to be repeated.

stopTime.description: Configure the Stop Time for the IP SLA.

forever.description: Schedule to run the IP SLA forever.

time.description: Date and time to start the SLA test.

date.description: Date and time to start the SLA test.

startTime.description: Configure the Start Time for the IP SLA.

action-type.description: Configure action to trigger when threshold is hit.

count.description: Configure Number of times threshold to be hit before             triggering action.

immediate.description: Trigger action immediately when the threshold is hit.

consecutive.description: Trigger action after threshold is hit consecutively for             configured number of times.

aggregated.description: Trigger action when aggregated probes hit the threshold.

threshold-type.description: Configure threshold-type to decide when to trigger.

count.description: Configure Number of times threshold to be hit before             triggering action.

immediate.description: Trigger action immediately when the threshold is hit.

consecutive.description: Trigger action after threshold is hit consecutively for             configured number of times.

threshold-type.description: Configure threshold-type to decide when to trigger.

threshold-config.description: Set upper and lower threshold parameters.

packet-loss.description: Configure threshold-action values when packet loss happens.

test-completion.description: Configure action to be taken when test gets completed.

records.description: To clear history records, message statistics and threshold              counters of particular SLA entry.

icmp-echo.description: Configure ICMP echo as the IP SLA test mechanism.

udp-echo.description: Configure UDP echo as the IP SLA test mechanism.

tcp-connect.description: Configure TCP connect as the IP SLA test mechanism.

udp-jitter.description: Configure UDP jitter as the IP SLA test mechanism.

udp-jitter-voip.description: Configure UDP jitter for VoIP as the IP SLA test mechanism.

dhcp.description: Configure DHCP as the IP SLA test mechanism.

dns.description: Configure DNS as the IP SLA test mechanism.

tos.description: Configure the Type of Service value to be set in the test              packet for the IP SLA.

history-size.description: Configure the number of history records to be stored for the             IP SLA.

schedule.description: Configure the start time, stop time, lifetime and frequency             of run for the IP SLA.

monitor.description: Configure monitoring parameters and respective              threshold-action values.

clear.description: To clear history records, message statistics and threshold              counters of particular SLA entry.
